content: Who composed the iconic music score for the 1977 film "Star Wars: A New Hope"?

The iconic music score for the 1977 film "Star Wars: A New Hope" was composed by the legendary American composer John Williams. His contributions to the film industry are immeasurable, and his work on the Star Wars saga is particularly celebrated. The score includes memorable themes such as the "Main Title," "Binary Sunset," and the "Imperial March," among others, which have become synonymous with the franchise.
